Unicron/Vehement/Reflector/Sun Crusher/Shockwave:





Unicron looked at the console he was at, with complete control over the 
Ramora, everyone else except Vehement locked out, including Hell Beast.

"The fools have stopped attacking.  A pity, I had plans for them.  My 
minions, we must act quickly now.  We must plant the seeds of destruction in 
this Neo Decepticon Empire.  They will be our puppets, and we will control 
their strings.  Emperor Shockwave is on his way.  Vehement and Reflector, 
intercept and escort him to Rana Kao and follow through with the plan.  Sun 
Crusher and I will talk with Hell Beast."

Vehement and Reflector gave a slight bow, leaving the room and heading for 
the nearest way out of the ship.

Sun Crusher looked to Unicron.  "What do you have in mind, mighty 
Chaos-Bringer?"

The ancient being smiled, which wasn't a wholesome sight.  "We must give the 
Neo Decepticons a guiding push to make them strong.  For now, we need Hell 
Beast's numbers to act out another piece of our plan." he finished his 
sentence with another evil smile, activating his comm. system.

"Hell Beast, this is the leader of the Brotherhood.  I wish to discuss an 
important matter with you."
